description: Stock coverage based on past monthly consumption

targets.rawSql:
with items as
(
  select i.item_name as item, mos.value
  from aggregator mos
    join store s on mos.storeid = s.id 
    join item i on mos.itemid = i.id
  where s.name IN ($store)
    and mos.dataelement = 'currentMOS'
), stock_status as
(
  select item, value as sort,
    case when value = 0 then 0 when value > 12 then 4 when value > 6 then 3 when value < 3 then 2 else 1 end as metric
  from items
  where item in ($item)
  order by value
)
select CURRENT_DATE AS "time", count(*) as "count",
    case when metric = 0 then 'zero'
      when metric = 4 then '  over 12 months'
      when metric = 3 then ' 6-12 months'
      when metric = 2 then 'under 3 months'
      else '3-6 months'
    end as metric
from stock_status
group by metric
order by metric asc

title: Stock Status
